entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed 'ppInfo->HasKeptAliveThis()' #64477
    7.0.0
  • VS 2022 preview 2.1: Blazor WebAssembly debugging can't move current cursor when paused #64475
  • VS2022 Blazor debugging with F10/F11 goes into JS minimised code and not my code #64474
  • NodeJS packed as correlation payload doesn't preserve symbolic links #64473
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonValue is almost unusable #64472
  • R2R-CrossGen2 failure - loader/classloader/reffields/validate/validate.sh #64466
    7.0.0
  • R2R-CrossGen2 failure - loader\\classloader\\reffields\\validate\\validate.cmd #64465
    7.0.0
  • Update the XML docs for IComparisonOperators and implementing types #64463
    7.0.0
  • Http proxy not working with authentication #64459
  • Android profiling crashes Podcast app on startup #64458
    6.0.MAUI
  • ARM64: Use STLUR/LDUR on arm64-v8.4+ #64457
    Future
  • [MonoAPI] embedding API testing and API headers quality of life improvements #64456
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Simple linear search #64455
  • Switch from direct intrinsics usage to Vector/Vector64/Vector128/Vector256 #64451
    7.0.0
  • Http2's SendPingAsync may leak UnobservedTaskExceptions #64450
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HTTP/3 Add QuicConnectCallback #64449
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 OpenSsl 3.0 TlsHandshake error #64448
  • Test failures in ECDsaKeyFileTests and ECKeyFileTests on Android API level 31 and higher #64446
  • NetworkInformation tests show weird error on macOS #64441
  • Connnection issues using ODBCConnection to connect to IDMS in VS2022 #64438
  • With .NET 7 SDK zip installation, maui workload install failed in CLI #64431
  • [API Proposal]: Custom the dotnet runtime root folder path #64430
  • [API Proposal]: Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #64427
  • Crossgen2 composite framework build emits OptimizedInboxTextEncoder layout mismatched with the CoreCLR runtime #64419
    7.0.0
  • [OSX/Linux][arm64] Assertion failed 'addOp2Type != TYP_BYREF && addOp2Type != TYP_REF' #64417
  • GetActiveTcpListeners is not implemented on FreeBSD #64416
    Future

Closed

  • support for SSLv2 should be removed from SslStream #35942
    7.0.0
  • VM: faster CallCountingStubShort #64471
  • win11-rids not present #62755
  • [Android] Building fails with Android NDK r22 on OSX? #55412
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_36614/GitHub_36614/GitHub_36614.sh #64418
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty(string) #62628
    7.0.0
  • Extend `System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat` so it can replace the Xamarin in-box `nfloat` for .NET 7 #63801
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.parseTest.RunParseToStringTests #64363
  • Rfc3161TimestampToken.TryDecode does not work for timestamps in Windows OS libraries Authenticode signatures #62307
    7.0.0
  • different publish behavior between visual studio 2019 and 2022 #58894
    6.0.x
  • WinForms published with PublishTrimmed option causes a Trojan/Generic.ASMalwS.3487958 detection by virustotal.com #59398
  • Raw Blazor code can't work with VB.NET #53169
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT publishing issue #64442
  • [maccatalyst][arm64] Flaky test failure in CI : Failed to get bundle information #63572
    7.0.0
  • GetClientCertificateAsync can fail with exception about corrupted frame #63662
    7.0.0
  • Expression.Equal with DynamicList seems to return only the first matches #52867
    7.0.0
  • capturing groups in .NET lookbehind assertions are greedier than their prefixes, unlike other engines #62104
    7.0.0
  • Logging methods created by generators allocate if LogLevel is passed #61162
    7.0.0
  • Support Metrics UpDownCounter instrument #63648
    7.0.0
  • Invalid format specifier on DateOnly in string interpolation leads to infinite loop instead of FormatException #64292
    7.0.0
  • Test failure CancelKeyPressTests.ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler #64364
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'helper.CanEncodeAllOffsets(REGSIZE_BYTES)' during 'Generate code' #64125
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64479
  • Implement operator delete on ThreadStressLog #64478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: fix x86 codegen issue #64476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add array-fast path in Enumerable.Min/Max(int/long) #64470
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64469
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [Mono] Add linux-x64 coop gc test run to runtime-staging #64468
  • [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #64467
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing getScriptSource when is an embedded source #64464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Rebind invalid breakpoints after receiving an update in that source file #64462
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64460
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.x
  • Set language specific flags appropriately in mono #64454
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Writeup on OSR Details and Debugging #64428
  • fix some test for FreeBSD #64426
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Fix layout and GCInfo for ByRef fields. #64422
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid CreateThreadStressLog under SpinLock #64421
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable test Runtime_60035 failing with Crossgen2 #64420
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Temporarily disable EC file import tests #64414
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • remove support for Ssl2 #64322
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • Remove pinning from StringBuilder #64405
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add/use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #64357
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Don't avoid LEA for byrefs (Fixes rolling builds) #64444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64398
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger outerloop test failure #64402
    area-System.Numerics
  • Small optimizations in `System.Net.NetworkInformation` #64423
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • pass the argument forward #64445
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Ignore non-X509 certificates in SignedCms #64348
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Move the breakpoint line after applying changes #64359
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-vs4mac' #64403
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #51371 removed CaseInsensitivePlatforms and CaseSensitivePlatforms parameters #64440
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][windows] Disable Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.TestsLoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests with ActiveIssue #64436
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Remove empty Dispose method in InflaterManaged #64443
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix NativeAOT official build #64432
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete null comparisons of non-null arguments #64435
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Native AOT pointer to runtimelab #64429
    area-Meta
  • AltTrailingSlash tests should actually use AltDirectorySeparatorChar #64437
    area-System.IO, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • Add support for byref fields in NativeAOT/crossgen2 #64366
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Removing `tiVerificationNeeded` in the JIT #64356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change condition on RegexReductionTests to be explicit about trimming #64411
  • Add Metrics UpDownCounter #64365
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 7.0.0
  • gcc compilations for ARM64 can not initialize extern "C" variables. #64239
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable osr stress tests for libraries and add fixes #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler test #64407
    area-System.Console
  • [JIT] Use byteCount when deciding what instruction sequence to use in genCodeForCpBlkUnroll #64315
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fold inbox crypto into one assembly #64307
    area-System.Security
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Allow missing assemblies in llvmonly+interp mode. #64294
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63739
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.3
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64352
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    * NO MERGE *, area-Debugger-mono
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Move FabricBot generation scripts to dotnet/runtime #64324
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose or cancelationToken #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix some nullability warnings in NativeAOT CoreLib #64404
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Issue #21678: Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #64347
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use stable outputs in illink targets #64160
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to update .NET6 workloads with 6.0.200-preview.22055.15 #23653
  • Package validation does not report any compatibility errors if package name != assembly name #23646

Closed

  • PackageValidation is causing unnecessary project evaluations which noticeably slows down a project's build #23630

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #23656

Updated

  • Include fsharp core #23629
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Csc task crash during build cancelation #59145
  • When using full paths to source xaml files, the generated .g.cs files aren't placed in subfolders in the obj\target folder #59142
  • Add an API to the GeneratorDriver to let us hook and report errors #59141
  • Support feed-forward type hinting for the binding process #59139
  • GTD: Better name for project containing files retrieved via Source Link #59138
  • File opened locally via GTD with Source Link should not be "live" #59137
  • Improve IDE0046 to not report when in a else if chain #59135
  • Inconsistent behavior with dynamic and void returning functions #59132
  • FixAllProvider doesn't support more than two fixes with some identical insertions #59130
  • Integration tests fail when System.Composition.* packages are updated to 6.0.0 #59128
  • [LSP] Provide more info in Go To Implementation results #59126

Closed

  • AdditionalLocations for CS8618 in DiagnosticSuppressor #58073
  • C#: erroneus CS8618 warning with partial class when definition is in one file and initialization in another #58640
    17.2
  • VB CompilationUnit crashes on NormalizeWhitespace #13484
    Compiler.Next
  • UserFunctionException --> OperationCanceledException in SourceGeneration/Nodes/SyntaxReceiverInputNode.cs:line 81 #58290
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions" #59148
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2 #59147
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access API for find usages #59144
    Area-IDE
  • Fix completion not working for pointer-typed parameters #59143
    Area-IDE
  • Run 17.0 integration tests against the Release VS instead of Preview #59136
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update prerelease version for 17.1 Preview 5 #59127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix Roslyn Diagnostic Window and add Workspace panel #59035
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Adjust reflection based code in VisualStudioDiagnosticAnalyzerProvide…" #59115
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Add nuget service connection to restore internal tools #59140
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE, Need Design Review, Next
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix 'hasStaticConstructor' check in MethodCompiler #59116
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Json parsing with tests. #42873
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #59073
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project" #59129
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59151
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #59150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge the interpolated end tokens into a single token #59122
    Area-Compilers
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [semi-auto-props]: Avoid using `IsAutoProperty` when possible #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't show colon suffix in property pattern completion #59031
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • [Draft] Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP .NET Core Razor Page Data Annotations Localizations fail #39849
  • blazor errors without ambiguity #39848
  • Blazor does not passes typeparam TItem into EventCallback through attribute [CascadingTypeParameter(nameof(TItem))] #39847
  • Connection performance improvements #39846
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Allow direct configuration of authorization policies via endpoint metadata #39840
    .NET 7 Planning
  • JSRuntime.Invoke APIs aren't correctly annotated for trimming #39839
  • Design proposal: Bind get/set/after modifiers #39837
    7.0-preview2
  • Virtualize working great - Modal implementation causes exponential lag #39834
  • I have this issue with asp.net run in the back-end #39844
  • Non bubbled event from custom element doesn't reach the Blazor handler #39831
  • Sections doesn't populate from partials. #39830
  • Review NPM distribution files #39829
  • Perf regression: json #39828
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #39827
  • JSON string content is null in Put action when request is done using fetch #39826
  • Including a NativeFileReference causes a Blazor error in Release mode #39825

Closed

  • Hot Reload not working on converted project #38512
  • Image srcset and size on Blazor WASM are not working on Safari. #38804
    Backlog
  • Option to have area views without an areas folder #38650
    Discussions
  • .NET 6 Blazor byte[] issue #39843
  • Blazor WebAssembly MSAL authentication error #35162
    7.0-preview1
  • Annotate and mark remaining Blazor WASM assemblies #30751
    7.0-preview2
  • [6.0.x] Port fix for https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/39526 to .NET 6 #39729
    6.0.x
  • Blazor WASM Auth force token renew #39775
  • Load a script from an external JavaScript file (.js) collocated with a component #39784
  • Product Unit Recommendation On How To Cache Bust Blazor WASM Files #39791
  • Blazor and WebComponents #39806

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not upgrade warnings to errors in VS #39845
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39842
    area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] Make UseUrls() override default hosting config #39836
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Use non-generic TaskCompletionSource #39835
    area-mvc, area-runtime, area-signalr, area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication #39838
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix null reference exception caused by ambiguous routes #39833
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Reenable tests on arm queues #39821
    area-security, area-identity, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Added support for arrays of types with TryParse, StringValues and string[] for query strings and headers #39809
    area-web-frameworks
  • [7.0-preview1] Update precedence of templates for 7.0 #39794
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Inferring FromServices optionality #39804
    area-mvc
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fork component analyzers #39796
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Extend diagnostics to handle tcpip diagnostics client option #2833

Merged

  • Fix the generated DML for Array contents. #2832
    bug, auto-merge, .NET 7.0

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Disable Microsoft.Extensions.Logging by default in Release builds #4394
  • Proposal: Remove Maui's Dependency on Extensions.Hosting #4393
  • iOS and MacCatalyst MauiApplicationDelegate should derive from UIResponder #4390
  • Button Background on WinUI only updates after you move the cursor off the Button #4386
  • First pass at consistent Mapper naming and shifting to interfaced handlers #4378
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • .NET MAUI Android target publishing/archiving #4377
  • [Blazor] Bring-in sdk style tests support for build and "publish" for Maui apps #4375
  • [Windows] Device.Display.MainDissplayInfo throws ArgumentException #4373
  • Collection view not working in realse mode #4371
  • Maui preview 4.0 when try to realease application show error #4369
  • Fix how our ViewHandler exposes out INativeViewHandler.NativeView and cleanup GetWrappedNativeView #4366
  • Error `Workload ID android-aot isn't supported on this platform.` on Windows #4363

Closed

  • Failed to publish maui blazor app on windows #3977
  • Crash on startup for default MAUI Blazor app on Android release mode #4262
  • [Bug] Maui-Blazor Project Template crashes in Release Mode #2246
  • Make Item Templates visible in Visual Studio #2686
  • `<MauiAsset>` is hard to use #3270
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView Issue if href to external site is clicked - can't return to app #3385
  • Essentials requires lifecycle registration steps to be fully usable beyond the template #4222
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add nuget API diffs to CI pipeline #4316
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Incomplete callstack on startup exceptions in windows #4379
  • Blazor startup errors for duplicate routes is hard to discover and debug #3695
  • The MAUI app project template does not target windows out-of-the-box #4374
  • android's Switch is wrong working #4368
  • Toolbar menu items are no longer rendered in MAUI P12 #4337
  • Animation RelRotateTo Behaves different on windows and android #3560
  • Raw asset added to MauiApp replicates the source folder structure in the destination instead of adding it to the assets folder in Android #2145

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial design doc around how Handler Resolution works #4392
  • Switches to UIResponder for App/Scene delegates #4391
  • Correctly register DependencyService entries #4385
    area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
  • [X] add error diagnostics to XamlG sourceGen #4376
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Housekeeping] Add pending events in iOS DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #4372
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Set correct Idiom #4370
    area/Xaml </>, platform/windows 🪟

Merged

  • Support Blazor Android WebView `Back` Navigation #4364
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Update api-tools to support roll-forward #4387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • ScrollView and Activityindicator interfaced Handlers #4382
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Use GetWrappedView to get the native view #4389
  • Publish the API diffs to the Extensions tab #4383
  • Improve consistency with resizetizer #4367
    t/breaking 💥, area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • Add `@dotnet/dotnet-maui-blazor-eng` to Blazor Desktop CODEOWNERS #4365
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4362
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Adding API diffs to the build #4354
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • WinUI TabbedPage Tests/Cleanup/BarBackground #4360
  • [android] update built-in AOT profile #4355

Updated

  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281
    area/shell 🐢
  • GraphicsView Touches - Alternate API #4342
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Add pending events in EntryHandler #4347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected ambient transaction behavior when use DbContextPool in EF Core 6.0 #27308
  • F# EF and type providers for SQL #27307
  • Why does application start start with dotnet ef migrations add? #27306
  • Net6.0, Core Web, there is a critical error when the right table does not have a left table Id! #27305

Closed

  • Add inheritdoc to migration files #10695
    7.0.0
  • facing problem while add-migration #27304
  • Scaffold-DbContext doesn't produce AspNetUserRoles Class and DbSet #27279
  • Unexpected behavior when walking through EntityQueryable #27264
  • When inserting data, the navigation property is empty and an error will be reported #27225
  • EF core 6.0.1 Add Migrations Fail, with default decimal - Fails/Does NOT create Database #27197
  • Make it easier to delete properties/columns in 0-downtime scenarios #27165
  • Join same table twice, INNER JOIN instead of LEFT JOIN #27151
  • How to remove Entity Framework 6, and only use Entity Framework Core? #27051
  • Add AddDbContextPool overloads to configure the ServiceLifetime #27303

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add <inheritdoc /> in migrations #27268
  • Fix efcore-docs links #27309
  • Check for updates on nuget.org #27288

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302
    Servicing-consider
  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291
  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • When installing .NET 7.0 SDK, some packages' version are 6.0 not 7.0 #13127
  • MacOs bundles are twice the size they should be #13144

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor smoke-test to captures prereqs #13145

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13135
